top_comments.comment: OMG Allie !! 🙌🏻🙌🏻👏🏻👏🏻👏🏻 I listened to it again and again ❤... If you had sung here, as we Italians are made, after such an interpretation you would have taken a headache from all the applause, the screams and the compliments!! 🤦🏻‍♂️🤷🏻‍♂️😅🙌🏻👏🏻👏🏻 You are unique !! 🙌🏻🙌🏻 👏🏻👏🏻🤟🏻🤟🏻 ♥️♥ ️ ️ Thank you for sharing your great gift with us !! ️🙏🏻🙏🏻♥️❤👋🏻👋🏻
I remember you singing this song a couple years ago, it was my ultimate favorite cover of yours and hearing you sing it with this amazing, more mature voice literally brings tears !
Boa noite Davi estamos de olho não perdemos uma live Guaratuba litoral do pr

comments_since_last_sample.body: Lovely. Allie you have a wonderful versatile voice. Keep them coming please. Thank You,😀🌈
